statements: SELECT * FROM crimes;
SELECT crime_type, location FROM crimes WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT crime_type, location, suspects FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT * FROM crimes WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT crime_type, description FROM crimes WHERE location = 'Main Street';
SELECT crime_id, crime_type, location, date, suspects FROM crimes WHERE crime_type='Robbery';
SELECT * FROM crimes WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT crime_type, COUNT(*) AS total_crimes FROM crimes GROUP BY crime_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_crimes DESC;
SELECT * FROM crimes WHERE location='Main Street' AND description LIKE '%armed%';
SELECT crime_id, crime_type, date FROM crimes WHERE suspects @> ARRAY['John Doe']::TEXT[];
SELECT * FROM crimes;
SELECT crime_type, crime_location FROM crimes ORDER BY crime_date DESC;
SELECT crime_id, crime_type, crime_location, crime_date FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Theft';
SELECT * FROM interventions WHERE intervention_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT intervention_id, intervention_type FROM interventions ORDER BY intervention_date ASC;
SELECT crime_id, crime_type, crime_location, crime_date FROM crimes WHERE crime_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM crimes WHERE crime_location LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY crime_date DESC;

SELECT intervention_id, intervention_type, intervention_date, intervention_description FROM interventions WHERE intervention_type = 'Arrest' AND intervention_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT intervention_id, intervention_type, intervention_date FROM interventions ORDER BY intervention_date ASC, intervention_id DESC;
SELECT crime_id, crime_type FROM crimes WHERE crime_type IN ('Robbery', 'Assault', 'Burglary') ORDER BY crime_id;
SELECT * FROM crimes
SELECT crime_type, crime_location FROM crimes
SELECT suspect_name, suspect_age, suspect_gender FROM suspects
SELECT intervention_type, intervention_date FROM interventions
SELECT crime_type, crime_location, crime_date FROM crimes
SELECT * FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery' ORDER BY crime_date DESC;
SELECT suspect_name, suspect_gender FROM suspects WHERE suspect_age > 30 ORDER BY suspect_name ASC;
SELECT c.crime_date, i.intervention_type FROM crimes c JOIN interventions i ON c.crime_id = i.crime_id WHERE i.intervention_type = 'Arrest' AND c.crime_location LIKE '%Street%';

SELECT s.suspect_name, c.crime_type, i.intervention_type FROM suspects s JOIN crimes c ON s.crime_id = c.crime_id JOIN interventions i ON s.suspect_id = i.suspect_id WHERE c.crime_type = 'Fraud' ORDER BY s.suspect_name ASC;

SELECT c.crime_id, c.crime_type, s.suspect_name, i.intervention_type FROM crimes c LEFT JOIN suspects s ON c.crime_id = s.crime_id LEFT JOIN interventions i ON c.crime_id = i.crime_id AND s.suspect_id = i.suspect_id;
SELECT * FROM crime_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, type, location FROM crime_reports WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT report_id, description FROM crime_reports WHERE location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM suspects WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT intervention_id, intervention_date, location FROM interventions WHERE type = 'Emergency' ORDER BY intervention_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, type, location, description FROM crime_reports;
SELECT * FROM suspects WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT intervention_date, type, location FROM interventions WHERE type = 'police intervention';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM crime_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT crime_type, location, year FROM crime_statistics WHERE year = 2020 ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT * FROM crimes ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT crime_type, location FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT name, age FROM suspects WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM victims_crimes JOIN victims ON victims_crimes.victim_id = victims.victim_id WHERE crime_id = 1;
SELECT crime_type, location, date_time FROM crimes WHERE date_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Murder';
SELECT suspect_id, name, address FROM suspects ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT crimes.crime_type, victims.name FROM crimes JOIN victims_crimes ON crimes.crime_id = victims_crimes.crime_id WHERE victims_crimes.victim_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_crimes FROM crimes;

SELECT suspects.name AS suspect_name, crimes.location AS crime_location FROM suspects JOIN suspects_crimes ON suspects.suspect_id = suspects_crimes.suspect_id JOIN crimes ON suspects_crimes.crime_id = crimes.crime_id ORDER BY suspects.name;
